Package mines

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • mines.Cell
  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    The Cell class represents a cell on the game board. It contains information about the cell's state and contents, as well as its location on the board and the indices of its corners.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int cellContent
      The content of the cell, represented as an integer that corresponds to a specific image.
      private java.awt.Image cellImage
      The image of the cell.
      (package private) int column
      The column number of the cell.
      private java.util.Map<Corner,​java.lang.Integer> corners
      A map containing the indices of each of the cell's corners.
      private int cornersMineCell
      The total number of mined corner cells surrounding this cell.
      (package private) static int HEIGHT
      The height of the cell.
      private int index
      The index of the cell.
      private java.lang.Boolean isCellMined
      The boolean that represents if the cell is mined.
      private static int MINE_CELL
      The index of the mine image.
      (package private) int row
      The row number of the cell.
      private CellState state
      The state of the cell, represented as an instance of the CellState enum.
      (package private) static int WIDTH
      The width of the cell.
